title.narrative: Emergency drought response through provision of integrated water, sanitation and hygiene promotion (WASH) services

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to provide WASH assistance to vulnerable people affected by drought. The IOM project aims to improve access to safe water through trucking and water source rehabilitation, construct and rehabilitate sanitation facilities, as well as to supply hygiene kits and organize hygiene promotion activities. The project provides life-saving assistance to 67,072 people, including 13,415 women, 10,061 men, 43,596 children, and 671 people with disabilities.
